articles.content:

articles.author: New York Times
articles.title: As Taliban captures cities, U.S. says Afghan forces must fend for themselves - Economic Times
articles.description: The muted American response Sunday showed in no uncertain terms that Americas 20-year war in Afghanistan is over. The mismanaged and exhausted Afghan forces will have to retake the cities on their own, or leave them to the Taliban for good.
articles.content: If the Taliban had seized three provincial capitals in northern Afghanistan a year ago, like they did Sunday, the U.S. response would most likely have been ferocious. Fighter jets and helicopter guns… [+7619 chars]

articles.title: Residents of isolated U.S. border communities confused as travel restrictions lift - CBC.ca
articles.description: As of Monday, fully vaccinated Americans will be able to enter Canada and skip quarantine. But residents of Point Roberts, Wash., and two other U.S. towns will be allowed to enter Canada regardless of their vaccinated status.
articles.content:
As Canada reopens its border to U.S. travellers, some residents of isolated American border towns say the rules for them are unclear.
